sections.heading: Director; duties; rules and regulations
sections.text: The director shall administer and enforce the provisions of sections 44-3701 to 44-3721 and may adopt and promulgate rules and regulations in accordance with sections 44-3701 to 44-3721.SourceLaws 1981, LB 113, ยง 19;Laws 2014, LB700, ยง 16.
